## Conservation & rarity context

-   **Rarity note:** Generally a summer species, but has flight periods in spring and fall in Florida.

## Natural history notes

Iridescent little golden beetles that is both beautiful and pestiferous, causing damage to their host plants by eating holes in the leaves.
